Name: rngsubtype
column6: oid of the element type (subtype) of this range type

Name: rngcollation
column6: oid of the collation used for range comparisons, or 0 if none

Name: rngsubopc
column6: oid of the subtype's operator class used for range comparisons

Name: rngcanonical
column6: oid of the function to convert a range value into canonical form, or 0 if none

Name: rngsubdiff
column6: oid of the function to return the difference between two element values as double precision, or 0 if none
